General.Name: Fulltech Fiber Glass
General.Description: Fulltech Fiber Glass Corp. produces and sells fiber glass yarn and fabrics in Taiwan. It offers fiber glass yarn for use in the fiber glass fabric, printed circuit boards, desktop and laptop computers, cellular phones, PDAs, and projection cloths, as well as industrial grade fiber glass yarn for use in insulation tubes. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 216 Tunhwa South Road, Taipei, Taiwan
